tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MarketTrends ( 
   id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   client_id INT NOT NULL, 
   trend_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
   trend_description TEXT, 
   trend_date DATE 
);

CREATE TABLE MarketAnalysis (
  market_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  market_name VARCHAR(255),
  analysis_date DATE,
  analysis_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ClientInvestments (
  client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_name VARCHAR(255),
  investment_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  investment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE InvestmentOpportunities (
  opportunity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  opportunity_description TEXT,
  opportunity_type VARCHAR(50),
  opportunity_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ClientPortfolio (
  portfolio_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  investment_id INT,
  portfolio_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE MarketTrends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR,
    price DECIMAL,
    volume INT,
    trend VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE Opportunities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    opportunity_name VARCHAR,
    opportunity_type VARCHAR,
    status VARCHAR,
    category VARCHAR,
    client_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Clients (
    client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR,
    client_type VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    phone_number VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE ClientPortfolio (
    client_id INT,
    symbol VARCHAR,
    quantity INT,
    buy_price DECIMAL,
    buy_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (client_id, symbol)
);
